entry.name: Alpha Colour Modify
entry.comment:
UnStable Code. you can set Colour as Float. 1(Float) = 256(decimal)
Memory(Float) * 256 = Colour Code. Colour Code / 256 = Memory(Float)
3F800000 = 1,
12D1F180 = Red 12D1F184 = Green 12D1F188 = Blue
Working Online/Offline. (client only)

entry.name: Bravo Colour Modify
entry.comment:
UnStable Code. you can set Colour as Float. 1(Float) = 256(dec)
Memory(Float) * 256 = Colour Code. Colour Code / 256 = Memory(Float)
3F800000 = 1,
12D1F190 = Red 12D1F194 = Green 12D1F198 = Blue
Working Online/Offline. (client only)
